DUSCIAN PORTAL

MY WEBSITE WELCOMES YOU! This website was developed as a final ICT project. This will be a collection of some of the activities completed throughout the school year 2021-2022. ICT has led me to explore the world of technology through website creation, and I believe it is a fantastic thing to learn, research, and create. EXPLORE THE WORLD OF TECHNOLOGY BY LEARNING HTML AND CSS.

WEB DEVELOPMENT; A Challenge

Accepting the challenge of learning HTML and CSS: Learning how to code allows you to express yourself on your own website, to stand out from the crowd, to contribute more effectively to projects, to better comprehend and explore new languages, and to transfer into a different career.
